name: OCKReadableCarePlanStore
desc: A read-only store that fetches care plan data objects.

items.name: func fetchCarePlan(withID: String, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Plan>)
items.desc: Fetches a care plan asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchCarePlans(query: Self.PlanQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Plan]>)
items.desc: Fetches an array of care plans asynchronously from the store.
